extensions.name: Custom CSS
extensions.description: A FreshRSS extension which give ability to create user-specific CSS rules to apply in addition of the actual theme
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud

extensions.name: Custom JS
extensions.description: A FreshRSS extension which give ability to create user-specific Javascript rules to apply in addition of the actual theme
extensions.author: Frans de Jonge

extensions.name: Image Proxy
extensions.description: No insecure content warnings or disappearing images on https sites
extensions.author: Frans de Jonge

extensions.name: Sticky Feeds
extensions.description: Set the feed aside in the main stream following the window scroll
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud

extensions.name: YouTube/PeerTube Video Feed
extensions.description: Display videos from YouTube and PeerTube feeds inline
extensions.author: Kevin Papst

extensions.name: Dilberts Daily Comic
extensions.description: Embeds the Dilbert daily comic strip in your feed items
extensions.author: Kevin Papst

extensions.name: Teem Video Feed
extensions.description: Embeds videos from the skydiving website jointheteem.com
extensions.author: Kevin Papst

extensions.name: Fixed Nav Menu
extensions.description: Sets the position of the navigation menu to fixed when scrolling down
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann

extensions.name: Mobile Scroll Menu
extensions.description: Automatically hides the header menu on mobile phones, when scrolling down and shows it when scrolling up
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann

extensions.name: Smart Mobile Menu
extensions.description: Minimizes the required button space and groups buttons
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann

extensions.name: Touch Control
extensions.description: Add touch gestures to FreshRSS
extensions.author: Marco Heizmann

extensions.name: Auto Refresh
extensions.description: Automatically refreshes the RSS feed when there is no activity
extensions.author: Essa AlAwadi

extensions.name: Reddit Image
extensions.description: Modify reddit entries by displaying known medias and easing access to the linked resource
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier

extensions.name: Reading Time
extensions.description: Add a reading time estimation for each article
extensions.author: Lapineige

extensions.name: ThreePanesView
extensions.description: Adds a third vertical pane along the article list, to display the article's content.
extensions.author: Nicolas <nicofrand> Frandeboeuf

extensions.name: Invidious Video Feed
extensions.description: Displays videos from YouTube feeds inline and replaces every source by the Invidious instance of your choice for an enhanced privacy (no tracking or limitation)
extensions.author: Korbak

extensions.name: YouTubeChannel2RssFeed
extensions.description: Transfer YouTube Channel URL into RSS Feed URL
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer

extensions.name: FeedTitleBuilder
extensions.description: Build your own feed title based on url, the original feed title and the date the feed was added
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer

extensions.name: Copy2Clipboard
extensions.description: Add a button in the navigation bar to copy the destination links of all visible entries into clipboard
extensions.author: CNTools | Clemens Neubauer

extensions.name: Share By Email
extensions.description: Improve the sharing by email system.
extensions.author: Marien Fressinaud

extensions.name: GReader Redate
extensions.description: Works around a dating problem on GReader API with Reeder and EasyRSS (prior to 0.7.5).
extensions.author: Julien Av√©rous

extensions.name: LaTeX support
extensions.description: Add support for LaTeX notation rendering
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier

extensions.name: Date format
extensions.description: Change how dates are displayed in the interface
extensions.author: Alexis Degrugillier

extensions.name: Quick Collapse
extensions.description: Quickly change from folded to unfolded articles
extensions.author: romibi and Marien Fressinaud

extensions.name: RSS-Bridge
extensions.description: Run URLs through RSS-Bridge detection
extensions.author: Devon Hess

extensions.name: Clickable Links
extensions.description: Replaces non-clickable plain text URLs found in articles with clickable HTML links
extensions.author: Kapdap
